result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Eddie Joe Ivy

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  
Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Status conference held.  Atty. Krejci requests a final pretrial and trial date.  Court orders any pretrial documents be filed no later than 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7.22.2022, filed.  rmm

Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci. Constantine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel appeared by video means.
Case in court for scheduling conference. Defense counsel recently appointed and requests an adjournment. Case adjourned back to Br 01. 
  Status conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 09:00 am.
$500.00 signature bond to continue was never forfeited. Conditions of bail to remain in effect.

ADDRESS INFO for Eddie Joe Ivy
Current: 2338 W Becher Street, Milwaukee, WI 53215   (Effective: 06-06-2022)
Prior: 1618 South 115th Court #111, West Allis, WI 53214
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.
Case is adjourned for return on bench warrant in Branch 01, Judge Davila.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy not in court.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Hearing held via zoom.  Case set for status conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in court.  
Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Matter set for pretrial conference.  The SPD office has not appointed counsel yet and requests another date.  Atty. Fehr informs the Court this matter should not be tabbed to a DV court.  Pursuant to the intake schedule, this case is retabbed to Judge Davila, Br 1.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Status conference scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in court with attorney Michael J Cerniglia.  Defendant Eddie Joe Ivy in custody.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Eddie Joe Ivy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d9e3cc7f-7791-ec2d-80d3-5bfcdc106eb3  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with DWL, JML, or any of their family
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
